tool.name: GAIAC data averaging tool
tool.description: Returns average values for time series data as per the selected time interval
tool.help:
.. class:: infomark
**What it does**
This tool returns the file with averaged data based on the selected time interval in a time series data.
-----
**Inputs** Data averaging tool * **--Input file** Input data frame as a tabular file. * **--Time stamp column** select the time stamp column in the dataset from the given list. * **--Time interval in minutes** provide the time interval in minutes for which data averaging is to be performed
-----
**Outputs** * Returns file with averaged data based on the selected time interval
